meanings.sent1: The bibless baby made a mess while eating.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses bibless shirts to avoid spills.
meanings.sent3: The bibless toddler turned mealtime into a colorful adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her bibless attire was a recipe for disaster during the spaghetti dinner.
meanings.sent5: The bibless child's shirt was soon covered in food stains.

meanings.sent1: The bibless diner accidentally spilled soup on his shirt.
meanings.sent2: I prefer bibless clothing for casual outings.
meanings.sent3: The bibless guest left a trail of crumbs at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her bibless outfit was a magnet for food splatters.
meanings.sent5: The bibless man regretted not wearing a protective garment during the barbecue.
